module.name: Call Recording
module.description: Provides much of the call recording functionality.
module.changelog: *14.0.18* FREEI-2750 Recording option "Yes" overriding "Never" (Ext to Ext calls) *14.0.17* Packaging of ver 14.0.17 *14.0.16* FREEI-913 Fix XSS Bootstrap Datatable Issues *14.0.15* FREEI-518 Call reporting module does not show recordings with empty destination parsed field *14.0.14* Fixing FREEPBX-17867 *14.0.13* Fixing FREEI-419 *14.0.12* Reverting FREEPBX-15208 fixes *14.0.11* FREEPBX-15208 Multiple Call Recording can be added with same Description. *14.0.10* FREEPBX-17466 Call Recording Pause Function removed *14.0.9* FREEPBX-18449 Call Recording module allows to create duplicate entries with same Description *14.0.8* FREEPBX-18481 Parked calls are not recorded *14.0.7* FREEPBX-17846 Function AUDIOHOOK_INHERIT not registered *14.0.6* FREEPBX-17466 Call Recording Pause Function *14.0.5* FREEPBX-18304 Ondeman outbound call recording failing issue fix *14.0.4* FREEPBX-18117 Entire incoming calls are not recorded. *14.0.3* FREEPBX-17466 Call Recording Pause Function *14.0.2* Fixing FREEPBX-17499 Setting default value for callrecording during bulkimport *14.0.1* Branched from 13.0.11.5
